title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Competencies: Comparative Study of Instructional Design Models for 21st-Century Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can compare and explain core procedures of the Dick & Carey model and Rapid Prototyping model

Learners can design three types of language education materials (1 quiz, 1 interactive workbook, 1 audio lecture) using digital tools (e-book, Canva, H5P, etc.), achieve over 80% task completion within two weeks according to a weekly time management checklist, and earn an "excellent" grade in four or more of five peer evaluation rubric items.
Learners can evaluate teamwork and communication competencies through project collaboration and propose improvement strategies
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
